name: Devoker
description:
Devoker is a FPS and Platform videogame it's set in a close-future dystopian world and its main theme its music and its Shoot & Run mechanics.

The Story is set in the dystopian futuristic city of New Los Angeles, where our character will face an evil corporation who controls the city in order to revive the music of this silenced world.

It's an early prototype, so there's some bugs :). All the feedback it's usefull for us to improve :D Thanks, and enjoy!! :))
